name: Add Google Sheets rows for new affiliates added to programs in Tapfiliate
description:
Every time a new affiliate is added to a program in your Tapfiliate, Make will add a row with information on them.
Make sure your sheet has got the same fields as this (one)[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1jj7Pj6DcPQWdiWOmRR1EiCIq8pz_gYnkk6zLAaOl72I/edit?usp=sharing].
